ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: Osteonecrosis of the jaw caused by drugs

ns0:Concept.displayName: Osteonecrosis of jaw caused by drug (disorder)
Osteonecrosis of jaw caused by bisphosphonate (disorder)

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies osteonecrosis of the jaw related to drugs and is appropriate for patients receiving urology care,),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to describe osteonecrosis of the jaw prior to or resulting from treatment during urology care.),(Inclusion Criteria: Osteonecrosis of the jaw due to drugs),(Exclusion Criteria: Osteonecrosis at other body sites)
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Definition: (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1164.20:Osteonecrosis due to drugs, jaw),(2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1164.21:Osteonecrosis of the jaw caused by drugs)
